title: Hong Kong high ping still persists
body: I am playing from Hong Kong and still have high ping since february. Current ping is around 220, previously 110. Does someone experience similar issues? Thank you.

replies.body:
Can you post the results of a Tracert to the League of Legends OCE server?

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq2

Tracing route to 103.240.227.5 over a maximum of 30 hops

  1     1 ms    <1 ms    <1 ms  192.168.1.102 
  2     1 ms     2 ms     2 ms  1-36-217-254.static.netvigator.com [1.36.217.254] 
  3     3 ms     2 ms     3 ms  10.193.232.21 
  4     2 ms     2 ms     3 ms  wtsc3a074.netvigator.com [218.102.40.74] 
  5     5 ms     3 ms     2 ms  63-218-56-253.static.pccwglobal.net [63.218.56.253] 
  6     4 ms     3 ms     3 ms  reach.ge9-9.br01.hkg05.pccwbtn.net [63.218.145.138] 
  7     4 ms     7 ms     4 ms  i-0-6-0-9.hkth-core01.bi.telstraglobal.net [202.84.156.17] 
  8   204 ms   205 ms   204 ms  i-0-1-0-2.sydo-core03.bx.telstraglobal.net [202.84.143.21] 
  9   203 ms   209 ms   205 ms  bundle-ether3.oxf-gw11.sydney.telstra.net [203.50.13.97] 
 10   203 ms   207 ms   204 ms  bundle-ether2.oxf-gw10.sydney.telstra.net [203.50.6.94] 
 11   209 ms   208 ms   209 ms  bundle-ether1.ken-core10.sydney.telstra.net [203.50.6.96] 
 12   209 ms   209 ms   208 ms  bundle-ether1.ken-edge902.sydney.telstra.net [203.50.11.97] 
 13   210 ms   208 ms   215 ms  rio1370642.lnk.telstra.net [165.228.9.78] 
 14     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 15

It seems like you'll need to contact your ISP about this. The routing that they're using seems to be the primary cause of the high ping, and not anything on your or Riot's end. Be sure to include this tracert!

> [{quoted}](name=Wuks,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=EEgIP5uA,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-05T19:55:03.807+0000)
>
> It seems like you'll need to contact your ISP about this. The routing that they're using seems to be the primary cause of the high ping, and not anything on your or Riot's end. Be sure to include this tracert!

Has anyone figured out why the ping is constantly high?

I have already contacted my ISP months ago and they said it was not their problem. The traceroute also suggested that telstraglobal.net is the point where ping gets high. Isn't Telstra an Australia network service?

> [{quoted}](name=Wuks,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=EEgIP5uA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-06-24T07:27:37.482+0000)
>
> Can you post the results of a Tracert to the League of Legends OCE server?
> 
> https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq2

Below are the results of Tracert, please have a look. Thanks.
